cab.content: SALE Off ARMS AFP AMMUNITION,,Uote by the Lord President of the Council covering Conclusions of the First Meeting of the Standing Committee on the Sale" of" Arms and Ammunition".I circulate herewith the Conclusions reached by the Standing Committee on the Bale of Arms and Ammunition at a Meeting held on 31st July, 19*;4, with regard to certain questions contained in Papers CP. 360 (24) and C.P.393 (24) which had been referred to the Committee by the Cabinet (Cabinet 41 (24) ), and also in a Memorandum by the Secretary of State for War relative to the supply of certain spare parts to the Esthonian Government, in order that the Cabinet may take note of the recommendations which have been made by the Committee.,439 (24).CABINET .(Intd.) P.Whitehall Gardens, B...6th August, 1924;'
